document_data.name: Li Mei
document_data.mainbody: '''Li Mei''' was a lover of an infamous [[monk]] from the nation of [[Shou Lung]] in [[Kara-Tur]], named [[Jade Panther]], active some years before the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Li Mei was responsible for the disappearance of the bloody fighting implement that gained the monk his infamy. With time, Li Mei grew disgusted with the monk's cruelty and stole the ''[[Claws of the Jade Panther]]'', the monk's gloves affixed with razor-sharp blades to savage his opponents. Li Mei tasked one of her servants with destroying the [[enchanted]] gloves, but instead the ''Claws'' ended up on the black market.
